snippet: Golden State, which led by 17 points in the third quarter, must now win its remaining four games to break the N.B.A. record for regular-season wins.
lead_paragraph: Golden State, which led by 17 points in the third quarter, must now win its remaining four games to break the N.B.A. record for regular-season wins.

headline.main: Warriors Collapse Against Lowly Timberwolves and Lose at Home
headline.print_headline: Warriors Blow 17-Point Lead Against Timberwolves and Tumble to Their Ninth Loss
